ai-patthana19.9:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: One whatever is suitable for the three times of the Dhamma
ai-patthana19.9:1.1_0: Not seeing the cause, without cause, with reason, because of seeing the reason for the sake of seeing, the cause,
ai-patthana19.9:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana19.9:2.1_0: ‘... for the sake of all six days.’ ...
